text.div:
English

Generated Narrative: ValueSet results-presence-absence-uv-ips

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 260411009 (Presence findings)
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 272519000 (Absence findings)

Gegenereerde narrative: ValueSet results-presence-absence-uv-ips
